text:
Finally, it’s here. Avengers: Endgame is undoubtedly the biggest movie of the year. The entire world is in a frenzy mode currently, and all discussions majorly revolve around it too.
AFP
From a fan being hospitalised after having watched the movie to another one spreading spoilers being beaten up, the crazy fandom around the movie is on its peak.
AFP
Even before the release of the movie, Avengers: Endgame had smashed several box office records, and now after the release, it has set the box office on fire.

#1 Avengers: Endgame has the biggest global opening in the film history
AP
Even before the opening weekend is over, Avengers: Endgame has already become the biggest global opener ever. By minting 644 million dollars until Friday, the film has beaten the record of Avengers: Infinity War.

#2 Biggest opener of 2019 in India.
AP
The Hollywood movie is creating a havoc in India. Avengers: Endgame has recorded highest day one collection of 2019 so far. Not only that, it is the biggest Hollywood opener until today. Endgame minted more than 53 crores on day one in India and in just two days, it has crossed the Rs 100 crore mark.
#3 Avengers: Endgame brought highest first day collection in North America.
AP
With a collection of 156 million dollar, Avengers: Endgame has set the record of highest single day haul in North America.
#4 It is also the biggest opener in China.
AP
Just in cases you didn’t know, Disney had released Avengers: Endgame in China before it released it in the US. Of course, China has always been a profitable market for Hollywood movies, especially the superhero ones. In China, the film grossed 107.2 million dollars in just one day.
#5 Record breaking opening in other countries as well.
AP
Not only in India, China and the US, Avengers: Endgame has had biggest opening day collection in several international markets including Hong Kong, Taiwan, Thailand, Australia, New Zealand, the Philippines, Korea and the U.K.
